Smart Trash Can: A smart trash can with a built-in compactor that can compress the trash, reducing the amount of space it takes up. It can also have a sensor that detects when the trash is full and alerts the user when it's time to empty it.

Trash Can with Air Purification: A trash can with a built-in air purification system that can remove pollutants and allergens from the air. This can be especially useful in homes with pets or people with allergies.

Trash Can with Built-in Recycling: A trash can with a built-in recycling system that separates recyclable materials from non-recyclable ones. This can make it easier for people to recycle and reduce waste.

Trash Can with Music Player: A trash can with a built-in music player that can play music while the trash is being emptied. This can make the chore of taking out the trash more enjoyable and relaxing.
Trash Can with Aromatherapy: A trash can with a built-in aromatherapy system that releases a pleasant scent while the trash is being emptied. This can make the space smell fresher and more pleasant.
